name: CubeVerse (itch) (Hamzah's Game Dev)
description:
Introduction:

Hi, this is my first ever 3D game made for my project for Game Programming 2 called "CubeVerse".  It is an 3D Puzzle-Adventure game, developed by myself for PC platform.

Game Made By: Hamzah (Solo)

UI & Environment Art by Hamzah
Programming by Hamzah

Game's Story Description:

You woke up in the middle of the night and found yourself in the Alien Cat spaceship. You have to play as the Cube and help Alien Cat gather and collect all the stones from different planets by travelling in the Alien Cat's spaceship. Would you be able to collect all 5 stone pieces?

Controls:

Move: W(Up), A(Left), S(Down), D(Right)

Pause Menu: Esc
